Wireless sockets: ZAP 5LX, 433.92Mhz

In seconds:
short delay=0.000201, 0.000202, 0.000203
long delay=0.000577, 0.000574, 0.000577
extended delay=0.005685, 0.00567, 0.00569

1 = short_on + long_off
0 = long_on + short_off

Switch 1:
on = 1110111110101010110011001

off= 1110111110101010110000111


Switch 2:
on = 1110111110101010001111001

off= 1110111110101010001100111

Switch 3:
on = 1110111110101000111111001

off= 1110111110101000111100111

Switch 4:
on = 1110111110100010111111001

off= 1110111110100010111100111

Switch 5:
on = 1110111110001010111111001

off= 1110111110001010111100111

Light Switch Arduino:
on = 1111111111110101010101111

off= 1111111111111010101010000
